projects.title: Cello Lingo
projects.description: An iOS application designed to help people learn how to play the cello. It has four main functions which facilitate learning how to read music, use proper technique, play music on the cello, and find songs with cello in them.

projects.title: Quack
projects.description: An iOS application that can be used for quickly surveying friends and gauging opinions on subjective questions. Includes the ability to ask friends questions, answer friends' questions with one click, and view results of questions that you've asked friends so you can make decisions with ease.

projects.title: Housemate
projects.description: An iOS application for coordinating duties, bills, and shopping between housemates. Designed for houses of college students who may or may not know each other. This app will allow housemates to send each other reminders to pay bills, do chores, or buy items for the household.

projects.title: Sound Sender
projects.description: A Twilio application that allows you to send a query via text message and recieve a call that will play a song from SoundCloud relating to that query.

experience.company: University of Michigan - College of Engineering
experience.title: ENGR 101 Instructor's Aide
experience.description: Responsible for holding office hours to guide students in completing functional and well-styled C++ and MATLAB programs. Grade exams, projects, and worksheets to ensure correctness, style, and progress.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Backend development for voice services team using Java and frontend development creating visualizations using javascript/d3.

experience.title: Application Developer Intern
experience.description: Developing apps and hacking alongside the best.

experience.title: RobotC Instructor
experience.description: Led a week-long camp for high school girls, assisting them in learning and applying a low-level language, RobotC, to program Lego NXT robots.

experience.title: Peer Advisor
experience.description: I advise undeclared students attending the University of Michigan College of Engineering on what classes to take, time management, extracurricular activities that might interest them and more.

about.description: I am a senior studying Computer Science at the University of Michigan College of Engineering. I have a passion for teaching others and have been an instructor's aide for two classes. I have also had two internships in software engineering at Detroit Labs in Detroit, MI and Twilio in San Francisco, CA. In my spare time, I like to create iOS applications, listen to music (currently my favorite is Philip Glass), read autobiographies, and buy stationery to add to my collection.
